your_tool: Your ultimate tool for managing job applications efficiently.
track_applications_description: Keep a record of all your job applications and their statuses in one place.
automated_reminders_description: Never miss a follow-up opportunity with our automated reminders.
detailed_insights_description: Get insights into your job application process and improve your chances.
join_thousands: Join thousands of users who have streamlined their job application process.
welcome_message: Welcome {{firstName}}! Thank you for registering with My Job Book. We will keep you updated on your job applications.
unexpected_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
copyright: 2024 My Job Book. All rights reserved
please_fill_required_fields: Please fill in all required fields.
delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this job offer?
title: Title
cv_cover_letter_required: Please confirm that you have sent your CV and cover letter.
cover_letter_sent: I have sent my cover letter
invalid_phone_number_format: Invalid phone number, must begin with a '+' sign followed by the country code and the phone number.
invalid_password_format: Password must contain at least 8 characters, one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character.
message_sent_successfully: Your message has been sent successfully.
message_failed_to_send: Your message failed to send. Please try again.
new_password_request: You requested a password reset. Click the following link to reset your password
if_you_did_not_request: If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email.
account_not_confirmed: Account not confirmed. Please check your email for a confirmation link.
